item.title: Sentry's Comic Vs. MCU Origins: Which Was Better?
item.description: Though broadly faithful to the comics, Thunderbolts* made some essential changes to Sentryâ€™s origin story, with some highly compelling results.

item.title: Mike Flanagan's Sinners Review Made Me Realize How Similar The Film Is To His 87% RT Netflix Show
item.description: Mike Flanagan has dropped a review for Midnight Mass, which makes it hard not to see how the movie is very similar to his hit 87% RT Netflix series.

item.title: "It's Phenomenal:" Jim Carrey's Favorite Movie Is A 49-Year-Old Satirical Comedy With 91% RT Score
item.description: Jim Carrey has shared that his favorite movie of all time is a "prophecy" for everything that has happened in television over the last 50 years.
